ygData.subject: Re: Please can someone help???
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a site called Necromonitor that has listed the requirements for the first 2 books with recipes: http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/
ygData.messageBody:
There is a site called Necromonitor that has listed the requirements for
the first 2 books with recipes:

http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/
